text.en: The great compassionate one, supreme among humans,
text.en-trans: tukjé chenpo kang nyi chokgyur pa

text.en: Accomplished the transcendent perfection of generosity.
text.en-trans: jinpé parol chinpa pün sum tsok

text.en: Just as the Blessed One mastered generosity’s perfection,
text.en-trans: jitar chomden jinpé parol chin

text.en: May I and others attain similar mastery before too long.
text.en-trans: dakzhen ringpor mi tok dendrar shok
